title: No access to old email
body:
Hi, i'm trying to help my girlfriend recover her hacked account... hacker is currently playing on the account. Her AOL account and LOL account were both compromised and she doesn't have the answers to the "secret questions" for her AOL account and thus cant recover her LOL account.

She sent an email a few days ago to riot, though i'm not sure if it was the correct place to inquire as there hasn't been an answer back.

i was hoping for some guidance and a bit of information on the procedure to go about getting her account recovered, thanks much!

replies.body:
If you happen to have her ticket number, I can check to see if it was successfully submitted. We're pretty slammed with support tickets at the moment, so response times are a bit longer than normal.

Let me know if you have any questions.

the request number was #23192316

thank you for the assistance, any information you have helps

Looks like you received a response from a specialist just a bit ago, so you should be set!

If you have any other questions, please let me know.

the email reply basically said that she was given an email with how to recover account sent to her OLD email..... as i said though she has no access to the old email so it's impossible to access that recovery email.

how do we go about getting in touch with a live chat or something? the email appears to be unrecoverable at this point in time so there's no other way than through direct verification with riot.
bump, hoping for some information of any sort here, thanks
